participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, always looking for opportunities to express herself through music.
participant_1.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and hardworking, with a strong affinity for animals and a passion for building.
participant_2.background: i've 5 cats. i am a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses.

content.text: hi, how are you doing today? i'm great.
